page.title: 03The Local Hastings Newspaper
page.content: Our local paper is called{"The {Hastings and St Leonards Observer." } It sells about {24,700}copies each week.They write a cross section of articles which appeal to all residents and visitors.In the local paper { {Births,Marriages and Deaths}are the most eagerly scanned.Also if there is a main tragedy naturally people like to read about it.Always favourites are the{Royal family,children and animals. The public are always writing in and complaining about{dogs fouling the {beach and the need for better shopping {facilities in Hastings.}The most noticable change in news items in the past year is about fantastic improvements to the{White Rock Theatre and the {Classic Cinema. The Hastings {and St Leonards Observer}employs ten journalists.
